text: A word will fill the little heart%% With pleasure and with pride;
With pleasure and with pride; It is a harsh, a cruel thing,
It is a harsh, a cruel thing, That such can be denied.
That such can be denied. And yet how many weary hours
And yet how many weary hours%% Those joyous creatures know;
Those joyous creatures know; How much of sorrow and restraint
How much of sorrow and restraint%% They to their elders owe!
They to their elders owe! How much they suffer from our faults!
How much they suffer from our faults! How much from our mistakes!
How much from our mistakes! How often, too, mistaken zeal
How often, too, mistaken zeal%% An infant's misery makes!
An infant's misery makes! We overrule and overteach,
We overrule and overteach, We curb and we confine,
We curb and we confine, And put the heart to school too soon,
And put the heart to school too soon, To learn our narrow line.
To learn our narrow line. No: only taught by love to love,
No: only taught by love to love, Seems childhood's natural task;
Seems childhood's natural task; Affection, gentleness, and hope,
Affection, gentleness, and hope, Are all its brief years ask.
